snippet: Congress has a duty to to take a hard look at goals and expenses of the military campaign in Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Editorial observes that Congress has not bothered to hold vote to authorize Obama administration's decision to pursue military action against Islamic State, even as price tag for the military campaign has continued to rise; contends authorizing new defense budget would force lawmakers to take stock of the military action.
lead_paragraph: Congress has a duty to to take a hard look at goals and expenses of the military campaign in Iraq and Syria.
